bibl.title: Pilgrimage and Holy Space in Late Antique Egypt.
bibl.note: 5 cartes, 4 plans, dont 3 dépl., et 7 pll.
14 articles. - I. Introduction. - II. Indigenous Foundations. - III. The Great Regional Cults. - IV. The Rites of Coptic Pilgrims. - V. Beyond Pilgrimage, Beyond Egypt. - Index.
bibl.seg: FRANKFURTER David (Ed.), Pilgrimage and Holy Space in Late Antique Egypt. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 134.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1998, 8°, xiv-517 pp., 5 cartes, 4 plans, dont 3 dépl., et 7 pll. ISBN 90-04-11127-1. Hfl. 276/$162.5.
14 articles. - I. Introduction. - II. Indigenous Foundations. - III. The Great Regional Cults. - IV. The Rites of Coptic Pilgrims. - V. Beyond Pilgrimage, Beyond Egypt. - Index.
C.R. par Michel Malaise, ChrEg 75 (2000) No. 149, pp. 197-199. - Siegfried Richter, VigChr 55 (2001) pp. 328-333. - Tim Vivian, JThS 51 (2000) pp. 342-344.
